text: Na'ankure vahe'motama kefo tavu'tvama nehuna zante nagra antahintahitamia eriama hu'naku kazokzo eri'za vahete'ene kva vahetera hunte'na nehue. Korapara kasege ha'nentagita agru huno avu sese osu tamavutamava huta vu'nazanagi, menina atretma fatgozamofo kazokzo eri'za vahe nemanita, agru nehutma ruotge huta manigahaze.
